action.description: The committee(s) on  HHS recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in HHS were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) San Buenaventura, Hashimoto; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Aquino ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Fevella; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Keohokalole.
